listing.listing_description:
Grand Cayman’s Casa Luna Resort is the perfect destination for those looking to experience relaxing island life from the comfort of a luxurious family home. Three-king-ensuite-bedrooms and quick walking access to the resort’s many amenities will take all the stress out of organizing a vacation. Upon arrival, you’ll be ready and able to kick back and enjoy the beach and ocean, coming and going as you please, with no need to plan transportation.

Borrowing architectural influence from Tuscany, this beautiful home exists harmoniously with its environmental surroundings. Terracotta roof tiles, Brazilian hardwood floors, and stone staircases give the villa an authentic, natural feel. The open-concept layout and wide openings from the living room to the terrace ensure the free-flow of fresh ocean breeze, while the equally functional terrace helps blur the line between inside and out. And, a fully equipped kitchen, Sonos sound system, Apple TV, Wi-Fi, and air conditioning add a helpful touch of technology to the equation.

Casa Luna’s private beachfront and swimming cove are easily accessible by foot and reserved only for guests of the resort. Their white sandy beach and calm blue waters are among the most desirable on the island. If you feel like a dip in the pool or hot tub, Luna’s shared facilities are located just before the beach begins, and they feature spectacular ocean views. There is also an exercise and fitness room, kayaks, paddle boards, and other water sports equipment if you’re looking for some aquatic excitement.

For some off-resort fun, start with the Grand Old House Restaurant, it’s just a short walk outside of Casa Luna’s gated community. Travel a little further, and you’ll find more restaurants, shops, grocery stores, and tourist excursions in Georgetown. If you’ve got a golfer in your party, The Ritz-Carlton Golf Club is just a few minutes away. There, you’ll find scenic coastal views, and holes that will challenge even the most experienced golf aficionado.

_ Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach. _

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This charming Creole style villa is a peaceful oasis set in a lush and colorful tropical garden. The view combines iconic Caribbean elements; swaying palms, beautiful foliage and glimpses of the sapphire sea. Whether you are relaxing inside or lounging outside, it is beautiful, private and poetically romantic. It is also a versatile villa. You can rent it alone for a honeymoon or cozy getaway. For larger gatherings, it can be rented along with its sister villa, La Pinta, to expand capacity. The two villas also share a tennis court and gym. This self-contained paradise is a wonderful place to simply shut the door on the world.

La Nina makes the most of its outdoor spaces. The beautiful crystal clear pool is the center piece of the spacious covered terraces and sundecks. You have multiple choices for lounging and al fresco dining allowing you to accommodate small or large parties.

The interior living space, with areas for lounging and dining, is an open plan concept, flowing seamlessly from inside to outside. Large pocket doors disappear into the wall allowing the view and breeze to come inside. The décor is contemporary with a cozy vibe. Oversized taupe wicker and cream fabrics complement the amazing stone wall in the living room. Charming painted furniture in neutral tones create a modern twist to Creole classics. The sleek, well equipped kitchen opens to the terraces allowing the chef to connect with the guests.

The two equal size bedrooms are set off the pool deck. The décor is fresh and contemporary with an old world Caribbean twist. Painted furnishing in taupe and cream are complimented by elegant linens in tan, cream and white and colorful artwork. The feel is cozy and elegant. The en suite spa style bathrooms are beautifully detailed in travertine tiles, sculpted sinks and walk in showers.

Although secluded, you are close to amenities. Long Bay and Plum Bay beaches are a short drive. You are ten minutes to the airport. Grand Case is only 25 minutes by car or head to Phillipsburg for some Duty Free shopping.

feature.p: Bedroom 1: King size bed, En-suite bathroom with shower, Air conditioning, Ceiling fan, Television
Bedroom 2: King size bed, En-suite bathroom with shower, Air conditioning, Ceiling fan, Television

listing.listing_description:
Le Moulin ("The Mill") is situated directly on St. Jean Beach along the north coast of St. Barts, just minutes from Gustavia. Named for the restored, antique mill on the estate (which now houses the master bedroom suite), the beachfront villa offers a superb blend of vintage Caribbean elegance and high-end modern comfort. Its ample estate includes an outdoor swimming pool, alfresco dining, and generous space for open-air relaxation, while the cool, spacious interiors feature lovely living and dining areas and a gourmet kitchen. Three superb bedroom suites (including the ocean-view moulin with private entrance) accommodate families, destination wedding guests, and groups of friends up to six in size.

The villa is nestled amid palm trees against the beach's soft sands, with expansive views of the turquoise bay and sea. Lounge chairs line the long infinity pool, while the spacious, wrap-around veranda features multiple dining tables and sitting areas—inviting you to relish home-cooked meals and sip island cocktails in the enchanting breeze.

Several sets of arched French doors open from the main villa to the veranda, inhaling the sea-kissed air into the home. The cavernous living room offers a dreamy, airy ambiance, with high, vaulted ceilings of natural wood, superb modern furnishings and décor, and lovely curtains. The light-filled kitchen features chef-grade appliances and spacious prep areas, with luminous white walls complementing the wood ceilings and sleek surfaces. It opens directly to the ten-person dining table on the back patio.

The master suite is set within the old mill, with French doors opening to a furnished terrace and the sandy beach. The room enjoys beautiful ocean views and features a comfortable queen bed and ensuite bathroom. In the main villa, the primary guest suite features a king bed and opens to the terrace, while the second guest suite has a split-king bed (or two twin beds). Both enjoy ensuite bathrooms with dual vanities.

Le Moulin balances exquisite seclusion with a highly convenient location within minutes of Gustavia and the international airport. In addition to St. Jean Beach bordering your estate, several of the island's finest beaches are within easy reach. Guided boat tours embark from Gustavia for the sublime Saint Barthelemy Natural Reserve.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Please note: This home is in close proximity to an ongoing construction project. For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist.

Perfect example of architectural avant-garde and fusion with nature. Villa Ethan is the perfect place for solitude and time away in an oasis in the middle of the jungle. Even though its hidden away, the property is still near the beach and town, in a quiet residential area.

The villa is only a few minutes from the city center and the incredible beaches of the Caribbean Sea. 

The villa has a modern, clean design. With four bedrooms and four and half bathrooms, Villa Ethan will be your place to disconnect from your daily routine and experience the perfect getaway minutes away from Tulum's Zona Hotelera and beaches.

listing.listing_description:
Promotions may be available for your desired dates, please contact a Villa Special for more information.

Luxury living meets the unspoiled natural beauty of the sea at Sundog. Set in an exclusive gated community on famed Grace Bay Beach, the brand-new five-bedroom villa is just steps from its namesake slopes overlooking Smith’s Reef. Open interiors offer incredible ocean views from nearly every room in the house, while access to Grace Bay Club amenities ensures an unforgettable stay in Turks and Caicos.

Your stay at Sundog starts with an airport transfer and welcome drink, and continues with daily breakfast service, a pre-stocked kitchen and bar and a complimentary shuttle to nearby resorts for dining. Two private terraces offer plenty of space to sunbathe and water sports equipment lets you explore the island’s famously warm, clear waters. Try out local seafood on the barbecue, eat at the floating al-fresco dining palapa and flip on the fire feature over the plunge pool for added drama.

A streamlined, contemporary aesthetic lets the ocean views be the focal point of the villa. On the outside, Sundog appears as a simple white box, but fold-away walls on two sides mean you can look right through the structure—and feel the ocean breeze almost anywhere in the house. You’ll want to spend most of your time in the open-plan great room, where cool neutral tones and modern furnishings create a chic yet casual vibe and a fully equipped kitchen invites quick sit-downs at the breakfast bar.

There are three bedrooms in the main house at Sundog and two pool suites; all five bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms. In the main house, each of the three bedrooms has a king bed and ocean views. One of the pool suites has a king bed and the other has two twin beds; both have al-fresco showers.

From the villa’s location on Grace Bay Beach, it’s a 10-minute walk to Turtle Cove Marina, 2 miles to the Turks and Caicos Islands Tennis Club, 4 miles to Princess Alexandra National Park and 5 miles to downtown Providenciales. Book a tee time at Provo Golf Club, 6 miles away, or explore Long Bay Beach, 6.5 miles away, and Cheshire Hall, 7 miles away. At the end of your stay, make the 4-mile drive to Providenciales International Airport.

Copyright © 2015 Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

ul.li: Bedroom 1 - Master: King size beds, Ensuite bathroom, View of Ocean

listing.listing_description:
This sleek contemporary villa is perfect for individuals seeking serene privacy, yet walking distance to the beach. Set in a palm filled garden, the elegant lines of the house draw you to the calming view. Green tropical foliage edged with the sapphire rim of the sea creates a peaceful atmosphere. This is a space to relax with a book or glass of champagne and totally forget the world. While great for small families and groups of friends, it’s perfect for honeymoon couples. It has an intimate and romantic feel.

The clean modern design of the house perfectly blends the open plan interior onto the generous outdoor spaces filled with dining and lounging spaces. Travertine tiles visually connect the spaces. Elegant, inviting designer furniture, used inside and outside, has a Euro style in soothing taupe, off white and grey with touches of vibrant color. The interior spaces have ample seating for enjoying the entertainment features of the house as well as indoor dining. A well-appointed kitchen pairs beautifully with the flow of the house. In deep aubergine, steel and grey granite, the kitchen opens to both the exterior and interior spaces connecting the chef with the guests. Covered, multilevel terraces create opportunities to change the scene. On the main level is the large fiber optic pool which delights with ever changing colors at night. Or perhaps enjoy the outdoor pool table for a bit of sport. For really spectacular views, head up to the roof top living space for a spectacular perch to watch the view from sunrise to sunset. A hot tub provides a tranquil spot for detoxing from stress.

The three bedrooms, with hardwood floors, are equal size, have air condition and flat screen TVs with Apple TV plus en suite bathrooms. Each has private seating on covered terraces. One bedroom is off the main villa; two are in a separate casita. The spa bathrooms are fabulously oversized with indoor and outdoor showers opening to private garden views.

Although secluded, you are close to amenities. You are steps from Plum Baie Beach. 15 minutes to the airport and in 10 minute you reach the charming French capital of Marigot with restaurants, shops and galleries, historic buildings and the Creole Market. Drive 25 minutes to Grand Case and Philipsburg’s shopping haven.

ul.li: Bedroom 1: King size bed, Ensuite bathroom with shower, Alfresco shower, Air conditioning, Ceiling fan, Apple TV, Access to terrace
Bedroom 2: King size bed, Ensuite bathroom with shower, Alfresco shower, Air conditioning, Ceiling fan, Apple TV, Access to terrace

8 km to Princess Juliana International Airport (SXM)

listing.listing_description:
Located right on the oceanfront of Puerto Vallarta’s South Shore, Villa Bahia is a contemporary tropical retreat, perfect for family getaways, vacations with friends, and high-end corporate retreats. Bahia’s social open concept atmosphere is ideal for group gatherings. All five of the villa’s bedrooms feature en-suite bathrooms and scenic ocean views. In fact, ocean views are incredibly easy to find within Villa Bahia’s multi-level layout. Nearby, you’ll find shopping, golf, nightlife, and plenty of beachfront in Puerto Vallarta, and along Mexico’s South Shore.

Combining sleek and stylish modern design with the stately character of Spanish colonial architecture gives Villa Bahia a unique atmosphere in its many ocean-facing areas. In the kitchen, you’ll love the vaulted ceilings, brown bricks, and the warm, Old-World atmosphere they evoke. The living room is decorated with plush designer furniture arranged around spacious sitting areas within the vast, open-concept interior. Large doorways lead to the balcony, making it easy for guests, ocean breeze, and natural sunlight to flow in and out.

Villa Bahia’s ocean-view balcony was made for capturing incredible sunsets, alfresco dining, and rejuvenation. The saltwater swimming pool, hot tub, and outdoor living area are perfect for relaxing afternoons. At dinner, the balcony has an outdoor kitchen, wet bar, and a barbecue. The endless ocean view will provide a breathtaking background for your alfresco meals. You’ll also appreciate the daily maid service. A private cook will provide two meals a day. And, the villa comes with a houseman and night butler so you and your guests can focus on rest and relaxation.

Just three miles from home, Los Muertos Beach awaits. One of Mexico’s most beloved beachfront areas, Los Muertos features pristine sand and calm, clear waters that are perfect for family swimming, water sports, fishing, and diving. You’ll also find hotel restaurants and bars lining the sandy shore. If you’re a golf aficionado, Vista Vallarta and Nayar golf courses are both within about twenty miles.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Spectacular views of the ocean await you at this luxury penthouse condo along Paynes Bay. This spacious, four-bedroom retreat, located near one of the island’s best beaches, is one of our top villas in Barbardos. Known as “Little England,” the island of Barbados combines British charm and Caribbean flair and is a popular gateway for visitors looking for sun, tranquil waters and vibrant nightlife.

During the day, spread out on one of the Italian loungers on the terrace overlooking the water, with a cool drink in hand, it’s the perfect spot to relax. There’s a private plunge pool on the balcony, while the complex’s shared pool offers a chance for more swimming and socializing. This outdoor space also includes an alfresco dining area for meals in the fresh air.

Sitting at over 6,000 square feet, you and your guests will have plenty of space to unwind in this upscale condo. Central air conditioning and marble floors throughout help keep the place cool, while another option is to open the living room’s doors that lead out to the terrace. The living area features stylish and comfortable furniture by designer Lynne Pemberton, while the gourmet kitchen comes well stocked with appliances large and small. Daily housekeeping is included as an added perk.

The villa’s four bedrooms can easily sleep up to eight guests, and children are welcome here. Each suite includes an en-suite bathroom, air conditioning and its own television. Three bedrooms feature king beds, while the remaining suite’s two twin beds are perfect for children.

Smuggler’s Cove is only one minute away from Paynes Bay Beach. This popular shoreline is known for its beach bar and calm waters that are perfect for swimming or trying out a new water sport like jetskiing and catarmaran sailing. The world famous Sandy Lane Hotel is also nearby, and Holetown’s restaurants and shops are only 10 minutes away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Enzuma is a beautiful newly built three bedroom villa located in the picturesque Toiny heights. The villa overlooks the Caribbean ocean and offers fantastic views over the bay. With its 3 bedrooms under the same roof, and its large kitchen and living areas, this modern and very well equipped villa rental is perfect for a holiday in Saint Barthelemy with family or friends. The wide outside terrace, which includes a beautiful outdoor dining area as well as lounging furniture, is perfect to relax in during your Holidays. You will enjoy swimming in the large pool while watching the beautiful view of the ocean.

listing.listing_description:
At the end of a private beach road, located in the exclusive community of the Terres Basses, is Le Mas des Sables, an oceanfront luxury villa with the feel of a country home found in the South of France.  Renovated in 2018, the villa incorporates high-end furnishing along with a brand new modern kitchen and extended pool and terrace.  The villa has evolved into a contemporary home that will find guests wishing it was their very own. 

The elegant entrance with its traditional iron gate, coral stone-paved courtyard and stonewalls is the perfect showcase for this charming villa.  The moment you approach the front door; the stunning panoramic views begin to unfold.  With the advantage of a gentle hill setting, the view is a very intimate experience set away from the clamor of daily life. The green mountains, deep blue sea and sky, the sandy beach, Anguilla and tropical foliage flow like a painting.   Step through the villa’s private beach gate and you have access to a very secluded sandy inlet. 

Built on multi-levels to take advantage of the setting, the design creates privacy from every angle. Beautiful native stonework flows through the structure and grounds. The improved terrace areas are dotted with spaces for seating and dining.  The fully air-conditioned great room, open to the view and breeze, is fully refurbished in serene colours. Travertine floors run throughout. The fabulous new French kitchen is straight from a design book on Provence.  Unique pieces like the antique French butcher’s table, charming accessories and stylish modern stove create the perfect atmosphere to prepare gourmet meals. Garden and sea view surround the kitchen while also overlooking the renovated and enlarged swimming pool. 

The three bedrooms, with en-suite bathrooms, are stylishly unique and exotic; each with a different design theme. All have sea views and two have been enlarged to include private seating areas with outdoor terraces. One bedroom is on the first level and only steps from the pool. The two upper-level bedrooms each open to the covered terrace but can also connect via a locked shared door via the master bathroom.  A seclude outdoor reading area can be found at the end of the covered balcony.

Although quite secluded you are a short walk to Baie Rouge Beach and just steps from the snorkeling site, Trou David, a famous landmark in St-Martin. You are ten minutes to Porto Cupecoy’s fabulous restaurants and seven minutes to the charming French capital of Marigot with restaurants, the Creole Market, galleries and shopping.  Only 10 minutes from the International SXM airport and 30 minutes to both Grand Case and Phillipsburg.

Bedroom 2: King bed, Ensuite bathroom with shower, Smart television, Lounge area, Air conditioning, Ceiling fan

listing.listing_description:
This gated home in Sandy Lane is one of our most luxurious villas in Barbados, with five bedrooms and plenty of space to lounge, it’s an ideal getaway for a group of friends or family traveling together. Visitors from around the world flock to Barbados for its crystal clear waters, coral reefs and sunny climate.

Lounge on one of the sun chairs surrounding the swimming pool, this back deck offers a great space for entertaining, boasting a gazebo and a sleek wet bar with sofas. This estate also offers places to rejuvenate, either by spending an afternoon wandering through the enclosed gardens or by exercising in the fitness room. As an added perk, a cook/housekeeper is on site until 4:30 pm.

The interior has been elegantly decorated by Aubrey and Charles of Designer’s Choice. In the living room you’ll find modern furnishings done in crisp whites, blacks and punches of pink as well as sea-themed accents and views of the fifth hole. From here you also have access to the terrace, where you’ll find a covered dining area. The well-equipped kitchen is slick with stainless steel appliances.

Up to 10 guests can comfortably stay in this villa’s five bedrooms. All rooms offer en-suites with showers and ceiling fans, and some rooms include views of the golf course, and private terraces; bed sizes range from a queen to twins that can convert into kings. The master suite encompasses the entire top level and is reached via a wooden atrium staircase. It also features private balconies (one with a bar), a king size bed and views of the Sandy Lane Golf Course and the sea.

While staying here, you’ll be just minutes from the beach and will have access to the Sandy Lane Beach Facility’s private cabana, tennis courts and golf course. The restaurants and shops of Holetown are also only two minutes away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Past meets present in a one-of-a-kind setting at Porters Great House Cottage. Tucked amid the lush gardens and mahogany forest of the centuries-old Porters estate near the west coast of Barbados, this vacation rental is the perfect marriage of traditional island style and modern luxury. Its three bedrooms are spacious enough for a holiday with friends and family—yet intimate enough for a Caribbean honeymoon if you choose.

After following a winding drive through the forest, you’ll arrive on the private cottage grounds, which feature a swimming pool, al-fresco living and dining areas, and an outdoor wet bar. There’s also a smart TV, Wi-Fi and exercise equipment inside. Your stay even includes the services of a cook and housekeeper.

The cottage has both an original coral-stone exterior and a modern wing inspired by the charm of the older one, all filled with stylish pieces. The living spaces are arranged in a line and flow from one to the next, with the living room and fully equipped kitchen at either end, and a dining room that opens to a lily pond in the garden in the middle.

The villa has one master bedroom with a king bed and two guest bedrooms with two twin beds each, which can be combined to form king beds if desired. All three bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning.

From Porters Great House Cottage, it’s a short walk or drive to some of the best beaches and golf courses in the St. James area of the island. The closest beach is Colony Club, just 5 minutes away on foot, and the postcard-perfect stretches of both Sandy Lane and Paynes Bay beaches are less than 10 minutes away by car. If you’re keen to tee off, you’ll appreciate that both the Old Nine and Green Monkey courses at Sandy Lane are also less than a 10-minute drive from the cottage.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Immerse yourself in the charms of St. Martin at Magnolia. A sophisticated hideaway overlooking the Caribbean Sea, this luxury vacation rental perfectly captures the island’s mix of chic atmosphere and incredible natural scenery. Reserve all three bedrooms for a getaway with up to six friends and family members, or book a stay in one or two bedrooms for a quieter holiday or even a honeymoon.

Take in the stunning views over the ocean to the neighboring island of Saba from the villa’s expansive private terrace. There are loungers in the shade and sunshine, a pool with a built-in bar area, covered sitting and dining areas, a barbecue and even an al-fresco mini-bar with a fridge. When the sun sets, flip on the provided mosquito trap and linger outdoors, or head inside to watch satellite TV or share photos via Wi-Fi.

Linked to the terrace by wide sliding doors and topped by vaulted ceilings, the interiors of Magnolia are bright and modern. In the living and dining rooms, sleek furnishings create a contemporary vibe that’s given a beachy touch by wicker chairs and light fixtures. The fully equipped kitchen opens directly to the al-fresco dining area for a seamless indoor-outdoor experience.

Each of the villa’s three bedrooms has a king bed and an en-suite bathroom with both indoor and outdoor showers. Two of the bedrooms are connected—the perfect setup for parents traveling with children but wanting their own space. Like the main living areas, the bedrooms are stylish oases with their own vaulted ceilings, brightly hued accent walls and doors to the terrace.

Magnolia’s location in the island’s Terres Basses - Hillside area is private, quiet and beautiful—think lush green hillsides sloping gently to an azure sea. But it’s also close to the white sands of Long Bay Beach, popular with celebrities, and Marigot, capital of the French side of the island. You’ll find plenty of restaurants within a 10-minute drive, but for a unique experience, make the 20-minute trip to Grand Case, known as the culinary capital of the Caribbean.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Let your cares slip away at Villa Tranquilidad. Part of the exclusive Puerto Los Cabos community, the beachfront villa puts you close to sun and sand, award-winning golf, the quaint center of San Jose del Cabo and the famous nightlife of Cabo San Lucas. Refined modern architecture, beautifully appointed outdoor living spaces and seven suite-style bedrooms, including one in a separate casita, provide ample room and opportunity to find inner peace.

Fold-away glass walls and shady palapas blur the line between indoors and out, creating breezy, inviting living spaces perfect for entertaining and relaxing alike. The wide terrace, which stretches the width of the villa, is bookended by lounging and dining areas, with a row of lounge chairs in between. The only thing between you and the beach is the heated infinity pool and jetted tub. In the evenings, a gas barbecue and firepit tempt you to stay outside past sunset, and an outdoor sound system and television mean there’s hardly any need to go indoors—though if you do, there’s a wet bar, home theater and fitness room.

With its courtyard layout, tiled roof, earth tones and exposed-beam ceilings, Villa Tranquilidad nods to traditional Mexican style. Its clean-lined rooms and furnishings, however, are all modern. Walls and floors in the same elegant taupe form a serene backdrop for contemporary pieces like a gray sectional or long dark-wood dining table and chairs. Paneled cabinets in the fully equipped kitchen keep to the restrained palette, but a blue tile backsplash is a more exuberant touch.

There are six bedrooms in the main house at Villa Tranquilidad—four downstairs and two upstairs–and one in each of the casita's. All eight bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms, air conditioning and access to a terrace or balcony. On the main house’s lower level, there are two master suites with king beds, jetted tubs and ocean views, and two bedrooms with two twin beds each. Upstairs, you’ll find two additional suites with king beds, jetted tubs and ocean views. 

Not only is the villa located on Puerto Los Cabos Beach, it affords guests access to the pool, spa, fitness center and bar at Puerto Los Cabos Beach Club. If you’d like to explore other beaches in the area, make the drive to Tabasco Beach or Médano Beach, both about 39.9 km away. Don’t miss towns and attractions like San Jose del Cabo, 9.9 km away, Cabo San Lucas, 40.5 km away, Land’s End, 41.7 km away, or Cabo del Sol, 42.7 km away. Active guests can play tennis at Canchas de Tenis, 8.7 km away, or Tennis Club Pedregal, 41.7 km away, or golf at Cabo Real Golf Club, 21.7 km away. At the end of your stay, plan on a 20.5 km drive from Villa Tranquilidad to Los Cabos International Airport.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Please note: This home is in close proximity to an ongoing construction project. For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist.

Embrace all these concepts by staying at one of most complete 6 bedroom options in one of the best and most exclusive gated villages of the Caribbean: Punta Cana Resort. This golf front property offers comfort, warmth, seclution and privacy in any of its large bedrooms, commons spaces with a neat and clean open space concept, giving an ample view of the amazing surroundings enhancing each detail with a modern design and minimalistic decor.

Villa Mandala is governed by a mesmerizing white in every nook, from the dining room with its enchantment to the garden, guided by wooden doors. The large gallery with the alfresco dining leads you to a palapa next to a large swimming pool where you can welcome your friends for a BBQ with other delicious dishes you can prepare on the fully equipped professional kitchen.

When it's time to sleep or you want to take a quick nap, you can go upstairs on the main building and find the master bedroom with a king bed, full bathroom with shower and tub and walk-in closet, a second bedroom with another king bed, full bathroom with shower and walk-in closet and the third bedroom with 2 twin beds, full bathroom with shower and walk-in closet. Next is the guest house with all bedrooms downstairs. The forth bedroom has two full beds, full bathroom with shower and walk-in closet, finally the fifth and the sixth bedroom have king bed each, a full bathroom with shower and walk-in closet each. All bedrooms have TV except bedroom with Twin Beds.

Every morning when you wake up in the main building get out to the large terrace to enjoy the marvelous views you can get of this amazing place.

listing.listing_description:
Hawksbill is a private eight bedroom villa located in the coveted Grace Bay area of Turks and Caicos. This luxury estate home has been spread across a number of separate buildings and designed as a multigenerational retreat. Showcasing contemporary Caribbean design that is both transitional and responsive to the individual personalities of guests, Hawksbill makes a great bet for a large family holiday, an impressive corporate retreat, unforgettable weddings and other special events. It can be rented as a 5, 6, 8 or even a 10 bedroom villa if combined with the adjacent beach house.

The grounds at this stunning vacation rental feature a long swimming pool perfect for laps, a hot tub, a fire pit and an extensive stone terrace. There’s also a gym, basketball and a tennis court near the entrance to the property. The main house accommodates a beautiful and stately Great Room with unrivaled views over Grace Bay. A separate family space houses games and a big screen TV.

The open plan living and dining area inside Hawksbill is framed by a high vaulted ceiling and an elegant overhead lighting fixture. Plenty of windows allow natural light to flood over the comfortable couches and magnificent formal dining area. The kitchen and screened terrace open to the outside.

Head up the cantilevered walnut staircase projecting from a native stone wall to the stunning master suite with fully pocketing doors and ocean views. On the opposite side of the pool from the main house is the stand alone master suite for ultimate privacy. An elevated two bedroom guest house with its own kitchen and living space sit behind the main house. Eight exquisite bedrooms accommodate up to sixteen guests at this non-smoking villa.

In 2015, Grace Bay was awarded TripAdvisor’s coveted ‘Traveler’s Choice’ award for the top quality of its soft sands and clear waters. Nearby outdoor activities include kite surfing, snorkeling, scuba diving and golf. Or try a scooter tour for a change of pace, possibly the best way to see a sunny island that’s only a few miles across. Nature lovers should be sure to check out Little Water Cay, a natural habitat full of friendly iguanas.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

feature.p: Please note that when booking Hawksbill Estate (Hawksbill + Beach House), the total nightly rate increases and a 10% service charge is applied. Please see Hawksbill Estate for total pricing.

listing.listing_description:
Escape to the seaside jungles of Costa Rica at this stylish villa perched atop the hillside of Brasilito Bay. Gaze out over Flamingo and the shimmering Pacific from the comfort of this gated property. Work on your vacation tan from a poolside sun lounger or catch up on some reading beneath the awning. When you’re ready to head down to the ocean, you’ll find 4 pristine beaches within a 10-minute drive.  

Invite the fresh sea breeze and natural sunlight to fill Casa Del Mar’s elegant interior by retracting the lengthy terrace doors. A simple color palette, with splashes of marble and wood, allows guests to focus their attention on Costa Rica’s lush surroundings. The open layout of the main room is sure to inspire late-nights with friends and loved ones. And, the farmhouse-style is sure to inspire your culinary side.  

Gather the group for a home-cooked dinner at the formal setting. After, set the kids up with a movie on Smart TV and move the party outside to the terrace. Mix up a few tropical cocktails to enjoy at the alfresco set or break away to a smaller enclave for more intimate moments. Surely, at some point, it will turn into a moonlit pool party. And, if you get hungry for a late-night snack, fire up the barbecue.  

Sip frozen cocktails from a coconut at the restaurant on Playa Flamingo. After a swim in calm, clear waters, head back for a seafood lunch. If you’re looking for adventure, try scuba diving on the Catalina Islands, just off the shore of Playa Flamingo. The islands are home to a variety of sea creatures including, sea turtles, rays, and dozens of colorful tropical fish.  

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved
